son.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Her son Sean was born in 1983.
They have three sons and a daughter.
In those days, the property went to the eldest son.
the son of a poor farmer
son.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: used by an older person as a way to address a boy or young man
son.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a man, especially a famous man, from a particular place or country
son.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: Frank Sinatra, New Jersey’s most famous son
